page.title: 02MINI FARM,THORNSETT
page.content:
This farm is owned by a local family. They have owned it for roughly 25 years.Since then they have built up their stock of animals over the years.
Now they have :9 ewes,5 bullocks,5 ducks,2 goslings,5 lambs,30 ducklings,1 drake,2 guinea fowls,3 guinea fowl babies,12 bantams,20 hens and 12 pigeons.
The family started the farm to keep their children off the streets.It is now a hobby which they think is useful
They own one acre and rent 12 acres. They pay weekly about Â£10.00. To buy an animal it costs:1 lamb Â£16.00,1 sheep Â£36.00,1 calf Â£130.00. The children from our school were able to watch a lamb being born recently in the field outside school.
